items.title: Kittiwake Border Morris performing Worcestershire Monkey at Sidmouth 2024
items.description: Worcestershire Monkey at Sidmouth Folk Festival on Sunday 4th August 2024 by Kittiwake Border Morris. Thanks @enigmabordermorris636 for sharing a dance out spot with us on the seafront, we had a great time! #morrisdancing #bordermorris #morrisalbert

items.title: Kittiwake Border Morris performing Twiglet at Sidmouth 2024
items.description: Twiglet performed at Sidmouth Folk Festival on Sunday 4th August 2024 by Kittiwake Border Morris. Music: Theme Vannetaise.

items.title: Kittiwake Border Morris performing Meerkat's Cloak at Sidmouth 2024
items.description: First performance of our original new dance, Meerkat's Cloak, on Sunday 4th August 2024. Music: Schottische Urbaine.

items.title: Kittiwake Border Morris performing A Clockwork Orange at Sidmouth Folk Festival 2024
items.description: Here's our original dance, A Clockwork Orange, performed busking on the seafront at Sidmouth Folk Festival, Sunday 4th August 2024! Tune: The Mighty Speedway.

items.title: Kittiwake Border Morris performing Twiglet at Priddy 14/07/24
items.description: Our version of Twiglet performed at Priddy Folk Festival 14/07/24 as part of the ceilidh spot.

items.title: Worcestershire Monkey Priddy Folk Festival 2024
items.description: Very honoured to dance the ceilidh spot on Sunday afternoon at Priddy Folk Festival 2024.
